Package edu.ntnu.repository

Interface QuizRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<QuizDAO,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<QuizDAO,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<QuizDAO,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<QuizDAO,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<QuizDAO,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<QuizDAO>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<QuizDAO,Long>
@Repository public interface QuizRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<QuizDAO,Long>
Repository for the Quiz entity.

    • findAllPublicQuizzesWithSearchString

      @Query("SELECT q FROM QuizDAO q LEFT JOIN q.tagDAOs t WHERE q.isPublic = true AND (LOWER(q.quizName) LIKE %:searchString% OR LOWER(t.tagName) LIKE %:searchString%)") Iterable<QuizDAO> findAllPublicQuizzesWithSearchString(String searchString)
